name: TypeSpell Journey
description:
This is a software that uses keyboard input and typing. It is suitable for users of all ages, parents and children, or school-age students. The purpose of this game (educational learning tool) is to let you learn language spelling and also learn to use the keyboard's letter keys to input . The content lists words based on life situations and related objects, enriching the way you learn languages.

In addition to language learning, it can also be regarded as the exploration and recognition of objects, because there must be an object in the world that you have imagined or already exists, but you don't know how to call it.

On this journey, I hope you will learn how to recognize objects, learn to type on a keyboard, and learn a universal language through it.

If your WINDOWS system has a voice package installed, you can also learn through pronunciation during the process, but some regional languages ​​may not be available due to WINDOWS restrictions.
Install the voice package on WINDOWS system: Settings>Time and Language>Voice>Manage Voice>Add Voice
